column3: This opens a can of worms IMO, and isn't worth it just to hide null values (which should be considered equivalent to omitted ones anyway)
@luke-jr that could be. I felt I'd be remiss to not at least propose a patch.
Code review ACK. \nNo opionion on the concept, I think it's fine to leave these as `null` when you want to use `bitcoin-cli` with an older server, but also to hide them.
If we do this, I'd prefer to add a comment describing why these `isNull` checks are done for these fields and not for, say `connections` itself. It won't be obvious in the future.
